description: After a video is imported into Lightworks, the LVIX file is created. It will be located in the Lightworks "Material" folder with the same name as the imported video but with the LVIX extension appended on to the end. If the imported video is named V00P00J.mp4 , the new file would be V00P00J.mp4.lvix .
NOTE: .VIX files are the same as LVIX files but are used for .MTS media files.
